General.Name: Noronex Ltd
General.Description: Noronex Limited operates as a mineral exploration company. The company primarily explores for base and precious metals, as well as copper deposits. It focuses on Witvlei project comprising two prospecting licences covering an area of approximately 390 square kilometers located in Kalahari Copper Belt, Namibia. The company was formerly known as Lustrum Minerals Limited and changed its name to Noronex Limited in November 2020. Noronex Limited was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Subiaco, Australia.

0.Name: Mr. James  Thompson B.Com., C.A., L.L.B., B.Comm, LLB, CA, FINSIA
